title: Indesign 2 help eek
content:
Good day all -   
   
Hopefully someone will be able to help me out with a little problem. I'm wanting to create a bulleted list and keep the indented margin of the text that follow the bullet. I've fiddled a really cak-handed solution using the tab ruler but I'm convinced there must be an easier away. Any help would be just grand ;)
author: dux

comments.content:
Try the "Indent to here" option. Insert it before your Text (after the bullet).   
See the right-click (control-click) menu: Insert Special Character.   
Shows a dagger with Hidden characters on.
Thankyou kindly my friend ;) That does the trick
